    \textit{#3} \hfill \textit{#4}
}

\vspace{8pt}

% Summary
I am a second-year PhD candidate in Artificial Intelligence seeking an industry research internship. My work focuses on applying AI to high-stakes, human-in-the-loop domains such as energy, security, and defence. In these critical settings, I strive to build AI systems that are robust, reliable, and transparently audited by humans, ensuring accountability, ethical alignment, and strategic value.


\vspace{8pt}

\cvitem{ University of Bristol }{ 2024-2025 }{ Teaching Assistant }{ Bristol, UK }
\begin{itemize}[leftmargin=18pt, topsep=3pt, itemsep=1pt]
    \item Supervised and mentored postgraduate Data Science students on industry-sponsored group projects, guiding research design, experimentation, and reporting.
    \item Acted as the primary liaison between student teams and corporate partners, ensuring timely delivery of project milestones and clear communication of technical findings.
\end{itemize}
\vspace{8pt}

\cvitem{ GniiamGniiam }{ 2023-2024 }{ Co-founder }{ Madrid, Spain }
\begin{itemize}[leftmargin=18pt, topsep=3pt, itemsep=1pt]
    \item Co-founded a restaurant-tech start-up that automated order taking and note-keeping via a QR-based web application.
    \item Led development of the customer-facing ordering app and analytics dashboard, reducing average table turn-over time by 18% across pilot restaurants.
\end{itemize}
\vspace{8pt}

\cvitem{ Lukkap }{ 2021-2022 }{ Data Scientist Intern }{ Madrid, Spain }
\begin{itemize}[leftmargin=18pt, topsep=3pt, itemsep=1pt]
    \item Built an end-to-end machine-learning pipeline to process and analyse open-ended survey responses, integrating clustering, tree-based models, and NLP sentiment analysis; cut analysis time from days to minutes.
    \item Presented insights to cross-functional stakeholders and delivered training sessions enabling non-technical colleagues to use the analysis tools independently.
\end{itemize}
